name: ocicni v0.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove code that sets lo to down prior ns deletion by @MikeZappa87 in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/104
* ocicni: watch bindirs too by @dcbw in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/107
* build(deps): bump github.com/containernetworking/cni from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/108
* ocicni: fix checkNetwork() to use the right Result version for uncached results by @dcbw in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/109

## New Contributors
* @MikeZappa87 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/104

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Updated containernetworking/cni to 1.1.0 by @aojea in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/103

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1

name: v0.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* ocicni: handle loopback devices internally by @dcbw in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/71
* ocicni: add new functions that take a Context by @dcbw in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/72
* bump cni to 0.8.0 by @aojea in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/79
* Pass aliases to CNI by @baude in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/80
* move netlink funcs and create stubs by @baude in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/81
* Only warn if there is an actuall configuration problem by @rhatdan in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/82
* fixes log levels, adds a few tests by @wgahnagl in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/76
* Remove error logging for deleteFromNetwork call by @Luap99 in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/83
* Silence ENOENT errors and sync networks if no match is found by @Luap99 in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/85
* Add InitCNIWithCache to set the cni cache directory by @Luap99 in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/84
* Propagate existing CNI_ARGS to non-k8s consumers, e.g., podman by @space88man in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/70
* ci: switch to GitHub Actions and bump Go to 1.15 by @dcbw in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/88
* ocicni: log pod namespace+name during network operations by @dcbw in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/87
* Freshen OWNERS with crio folks by @baude in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/89
* Bump to CNI v1.0.0-rc1 by @squeed in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/90
* ocicni: pass a Pod UID down to CNI plugins as K8S_POD_UID by @dcbw in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/91
* Add option to disable the use of inotify by @Luap99 in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/92
* Bump dependencies by @saschagrunert in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/95
* Switch to ginkgo/v2 by @saschagrunert in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/96
* Enable dependabot by @saschagrunert in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/97
* build(deps): bump github.com/containernetworking/plugins from 1.0.1 to 1.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/99

## New Contributors
* @aojea made their first contribution in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/79
* @baude made their first contribution in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/80
* @rhatdan made their first contribution in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/82
* @wgahnagl made their first contribution in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/76
* @space88man made their first contribution in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/70
* @squeed made their first contribution in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/90
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/pull/99

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cri-o/ocicni/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
don't print error when cached network load fails
    Change the message in case of missing CNI files
    ocicni: add support of specifying static MACs
    tests: name fix in cacheInfo
    bump up libcni to support cache IfName and NetworkName
    ocicni: find networks to delete from cache
    reload default CNI network name real-time if it is not assgined in initialization
    Avoid to overwrite network in loadNetworks()
    ocicni: use cached config for DEL/CHECK when possible
    ocicni: simplify building CNI RuntimeConf
    ocicni: make interface names more flexible and available
    ocicni: return CNI Result and added interface name
    ocicni: merge validateNetwork() into loadNetworks()
    ocicni: clean up usage of NetworkConfig
    ocicni: remove redundant CNIConfigs
    make testcases use fake exec to pass plugin validation
    update cni to fix testcase fails in validatePlugin
    add cni config validation before loading network
    Update the internal localhost CNI to v0.3.1
    Switch to go modules and update dependencies
    ocicni: ensure returned CHECK results are the same CNIVersion as config
    Add support for IPv6
    Always use results from GetNetworkListCachedResult() when they exist.
    Add Test for CNI Check; fix typo; additional logging
    Make use of CNI CHECK in GetPodNetworkStatus() when CNI config version > 0.4.0
    support podCIDR in cniNetworkPlugin
    ocicni: move pod-specific runtime config to RuntimeConfig
    ocicni: rename NetworkConfig -> RuntimeConfig
    Add approvers to OWNERS
    Add bandwidth plugin support
    add vendor.conf and update CNI
    Make GetDefaultNetwork publically exposed via Plugin
    Add ability to request static IP addresses for pods

name: v0.1.0
body: Initial release of ocicni with multiple network support.
